verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I stand all amazed at the love Jesus offers me, Confused at the grace that so fully He proffers me; I tremble to know that for me He was crucified, That for me, a sinner, He suffered, He bled and died.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O it is wonderful that He should care for me Enough to die for me! O it is wonderful, wonderful to me!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I marvel that He would descend from His throne divine To rescue a soul so rebellious and proud as mine; That He should extend His great love unto such as I, Sufficient to own, to redeem, and to justify.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I think of His side, pierced and bleeding to pay the debt, Such mercy, such love and devotion can I forget? No, no! I will praise and adore at the mercy seat, And testify all my desires He doth fully meet.
